The foundational elements of print-based design – typography, grids, space, scale, color, and use of imagery – guide visual treatments.

A material metaphor is the unifying theory of a rationalized space and a system of motion. The material is grounded in tactile reality, inspired by the study of paper and ink, yet technologically advanced and open to imagination and magic.
Motion respects and reinforces the user as the prime mover. Primary user actions are inflection points that initiate motion, transforming the whole design.
Within the material environment, virtual lights illuminate the scene. Key lights create directional shadows, while ambient light creates soft shadows from all angles.

German Keyboard - German Typing & Emoji app is useful to write German language characters quickly and easily. Beautiful and multiple background themes are also included that will decorate your keyboard. You can insert stylish emoji in your message to make your message clearer to understand. Word suggestions will also appear while typing, this feature is used to write more characters in less time. German Keyboard - German Typing & Emoji is used to write a message, email, post, blog.


 Permissions:

 Internet

 Record Audio

 Information we get from your use of the application is primarily non-personally identifying information of the sort that service like Google Analytics typically make available, such as the operating system name and version, device manufacturer,device model and identifier etc.

We may use this data to analyze how the application is being used. Other non-identifying information that we might have access to includes how you use the application.

In order to help support further development of the application we might include some non intrusive ads from AdMob. Please be advised that any data collected by AdMob is only used to prevent you with better ads.
German Keyboard - End User License Agreement
